comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

When using the up or down arrow to scroll the page jumps to the bottom. It jumps to the top of page if I scroll up from the bottom. This started after I updated with Firefox v.7.0.1
